ActivationFnLine
public
ActivationFnLine

Represents an activation function line in a 'net' file.

Properties
Id
public int Id { get }

Activation function ID.

Function IDs are integers and are always defined in a continuous sequence starting at zero.

Code
public string Code { get }

Activation function code.

The code is a string identifier such as 'ReLU' or 'Logistic'.  These code correspond with the local class names (i.e. not including the namespace) of the activation function implementations.

int id,
string code
)

Construct a new instance.
